question: I had a dream in which my deceased father ,i and a girl is in a house.My father wants me to marry her.Than my father give 3 currency notes to me for prpration of marriage.
answer:
QUESTION
Respected Imam. Please interpret my dream. This year during HAJ in mecca i saw a dream in which i,my deceased father,my younger sister and a girl is in a house.The girl is talking to my sister.My father is walking in house.What i feel that my father wants me to marry her and that girl also wants that.In dream her colexions were dark and she is looking a bit ill or anxious.Than my father gave me 3 xurrency notes for prepration of marriage.(The girl i real life is known to me not to my family.She is working at my work place.But there is no relation between us i only knows her name.I even not have talk to him a single word in my whole job.She is justlike many other girls working at my work place.I even never thinks about her.This dream is really shocking for me). Respected imam Is this a possibility that she likes me and she pray from Allah or do any wazifaa.And that dream is the result of that wazifaa.In which i have been intimated to marry her.If not than why my father come in my dream>is this according to sharria that deceased guide their kins. Jaza kalah
ANSWER


Share:
We advise that if you are inclined to the girl you saw in your dream, then
find out more about her character, conduct, etc. Consult with appropriate
people and also make Istikhaara.

If the results are positive, then propose to her for marriage. If she is in
your Taqdeer, then she will accept. If not, then search for another suitable
person.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
